title: Die letzten Vier von Santa Cruz

sources.title: 1936 Die Letzten Vier Von Santa Cruz ( Herrmann Speelmanns, Eric Ponto, Josef Sieber, Beppo Brem, Irene Von Meyendorff, Bruno Hübner)
sources.description: Film aus dem deutschen dritten Reich von 1936. Die letzten Vier von Santa Cruz.  U.a mit Josef Sieber und Hermann Speelmanns

metadata.Plot: An author, a businessman, a shipowner and a publisher form a business venture, which will supposedly exploit a huge find of lobsters on the island of Santa Cruz. After a report in the newspaper, the business' stocks do well. But the partners quarrel with one another and it doesn't help that there aren't any lobsters on Santa Cruz after all. Nevertheless, a team heads off to the island in a decrepit boat to open up a cannery in vain.
metadata.Writer: Josef Maria Frank, Werner Klingler, Alois Johannes Lippl
metadata.Actors: Hermann Speelmans, Irene von Meyendorff, Valéry Inkijinoff
